name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, a multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurred on Jiannan Road in Chengdu, Sichuan. A van carrying cargo broke through the front vehicle's glass due to inertia, and the passenger in the front passenger seat was in doubt about his life or death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 10, Dalian, Liaoning. Blogger "Football Fan Uncle Wang" was holding a national flag with "Serve the Country with Loyalty" written on his upper body. He was stopped by the police and was not allowed to enter the stadium to watch the game, and the two sides pushed each other.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 9, the Ministry of Finance reissued the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for July, but it has not yet released the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for June. At the same time, the fiscal revenue and expenditure situation for the first half of 2024 was released.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A document released by the Zhenjiang Lawyers Association on September 9 showed that the Zhenjiang Runzhou District Political and Legal Committee asked the Lawyers Association to inform that a lawyer surnamed Yu refused to accept the mediation arranged by the District Conflict Mediation Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, the Chinese national football team was reversed by the Saudi team in the second round of the World Cup qualifiers. The People's Daily published an article saying: The Chinese national football team did not show the advantage in numbers, and the head coach is to blame. Someone should stand up and take responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 11, Zhejiang Propaganda published an article about the Chinese national football team’s “Five Questions” that triggered deep thought. Question 1: The country is obviously prosperous, so why can’t it handle a ball? Question 2: The national system has achieved remarkable results, so why do we still insist on using the league mechanism? Question 3: The young people are obviously excellent, so why can’t the adults play like them? Question 4: Other sports can break records, so why is football always weak? Question 5: We are obviously disappointed with our country, so why do we still pay so much attention to football?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Putin expressed at the plenary session of the Eastern Economic Forum that he hopes China and other countries can mediate the conflict between Russia and Ukraine. On September 10, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded: China has always been committed to promoting peace and dialogue and supports all efforts conducive to peace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, blogger "Yiyan LuLu" posted a video saying that he was invited to attend the welcome dinner of the President of Tanzania. The luxurious courtyard, luxury cars and swimming pool in the video attracted attention. As of now, the videos on the blogger's homepages on multiple platforms are no longer visible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some schools announced that “Youth Great Learning” would no longer be used as an evaluation indicator, and some local Communist Youth League official accounts also removed the “Youth Great Learning” entrance. The reason is unknown.
